name: Feed the Machine (gomo-studios)
description:
Feed the Machine! 

Breed pixel art animals and feed the chimeras to the eldritch machine! Experiment with different flavours and try to survive for as long as possible! 

Controls:

- Move with the arrow keys or WASD

- Pick up and drop animals with "E". If you drop an animal near another, they will fall in love and start having children.

- Interact with the machine, the Shop and the animals with "B". 

Have fun!!
